I see your point but its been known since the 1st season and long ago that certain bloodlines have abilities like Shin. It wouldn't make sense for Shin's family to be the only bloodline with an ability, and it would make sense that a family with abilities would be seen as royalty like the Empire and their royal bloodline having their own ability. I think it fits and makes sense, and its not like they're handing out these abilities as we only know 2 people alive with them now.
